articles.title: AI Still Struggles to Debug Code, But for How Long?
articles.summary: Microsoft's R&D division tested nine AI models and found that none of them achieved a 50% success rate on common programming tasks. Anthropic's Claude 3.7 Sonnet was the best performer, managing to successfully debug the faulty code in 48.4% of cases, while OpenAI's o1 achieved success 30.2% of the time and o3-mini 22.1%.

articles.title: Goodyear police use AI to create hyperrealistic image of kidnapping suspect
articles.author: Azcentral
articles.summary: Goodyear Police Department used AI to create a hyperrealistic image of a suspect in the recent attempted abduction of a child. The department hopes AI technology will assist in solving more complex cases in the future in Arizona and around the country. The Republic explains what Silent Witness is and how to become one.

articles.title: After Ghibli, Tom and Jerry receives an AI makeover and the internet can't keep calm, see reactions
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: As AI evolves, people are experimenting with its limits. People across the globe are excited about what artificial intelligence can do for them. People are converting images of people into its Studio Ghibli version and now creating a mini-episode of the iconic series.

articles.title: We can't let Washington undermine NJ's economic engine: intellectual property
articles.author: My Central Jersey
articles.summary: Phil Murphy will discuss leading the country in artificial intelligence at the 2024 State of the State Address. New Jersey's economy relies heavily on intellectual property rights, particularly in sectors like pharmaceuticals and technology. The address will be delivered by Governor Phil Murphy on January 24th, 2024.

articles.title: Besides domestic deployment, India wants to see AI usage in Global South: Meity Secretary
articles.author: Beijing News
articles.summary: S Krishnan, Secretary at the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) says India wants to use Artificial Intelligence (AI) as a technology for itself and to see that such emerging technologies are deployed across the world, particularly the Global South.

articles.title: The future of work: how AI is reshaping careers
articles.author: Tehran Times
articles.summary: The way we work is changing fast. Artificial intelligence isn't just some futuristic concept anymore, it's a reality today. It's not just a futuristic concept. It is a reality now. It can be applied to everyday life. It has become a reality.

articles.title: AI expert, cabby die in accident on expressway
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: AI expert Sachin Mahendra Dedhia and his cab driver Parmeshwar died after their vehicle crashed into a stationary truck on the Pune-Mumbai expressway around 8.30am on Friday. The police have identified the deceased AI expert as Vashi-based Sachin Madhia (46).

articles.title: Issa Rae Makes Her ‘Black Mirror' Debut, Says She 'Related Tremendously' To Dark AI Hollywood Theme
articles.author: Vibe Magazine
articles.summary: The season 7 episode titled "Hotel Reverie" explored the relationship between AI and Hollywood. Mariah Carey Still Wants To Release Her Secret Alt-Rock Album: 'I Have'. Regina Cho is an Associate News Editor and Icon Regina Cho and Nacho is a News Editor.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia: More women than men in the AI sector
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Saudi Arabia has surpassed all other nations in female representation in the artificial intelligence workforce, according to the newly released Stanford AI Index Report 2025. The report was published by Stanford University's Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence. It found that the Kingdom now has more women in AI workforce than any other nation.

articles.author: Indian Express

articles.title: Working Strategies: Using AI to organize or even conduct your job search
articles.author: Pioneer Press
articles.summary: Amy Lindgren's column is the eighth in a series on AI and work. It will appear the second Sunday of each month from September through August. Last month's column described AI tools for interview prep. Previous columns looked at résumés and cover letters; best practices for AI.

articles.title: Former Google CEO Tells Congress That 99 Percent of All Electricity Will Be Used to ...
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: In Harlan Ellison's 1967 short story "I Have No Mouth, and I Must Scream", a sentient superintelligence named AM has taken over the earth's resources and exterminated humanity. A small group of survivors has been kept alive for AM's purpose.

articles.title: AI tool to check for skin cancer rolled out at London hospital
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: AI technology can give patients the all-clear without seeing a doctor, says London hospital's claim.    for AI technology.  For more information, go to: www.londonhospitals.com/ai/ai-technology.

articles.title: Goodyear PD uses AI to generate image of suspect in attempted kidnapping
articles.author: INDEPENDENT NEWSMEDIA
articles.summary: The Goodyear Police Department has generated an AI image of the suspect in an attempted kidnapping that occurred earlier this month. A student was walking near Village Boulevard and Watkins Street when a man grabbed her arm and tried to pull her toward Hilton Street. The girl escaped and told her parents who called the police. The suspect is described as 6-feet tall, 200 pounds with blue eyes and brown hair.
